video_caption: The video begins with a black screen displaying the text "APOCALYPSE ORCHESTRA" in gold letters, followed by "WACKEN WINTER NIGHTS" in a fiery design with Roman numerals "III" below it, indicating the third edition of the event. The scene transitions to an indoor setting where three men are standing together, engaged in a conversation. The man on the left, holding a microphone, wears a black t-shirt and has tattoos on his arms. The man in the middle, also in a black t-shirt, has short hair and a neutral expression. The man on the right, with a beard and wearing a striped shirt, holds a microphone and appears to be speaking. The background features a dimly lit room with people sitting at tables, boxes stacked on shelves, and a banner with the text "APOCALYPSE ORCHESTRA" visible on the wall. The atmosphere suggests a casual, behind-the-scenes interview or discussion related to the "WACKEN WINTER NIGHTS" event. The men continue their conversation, with slight changes in their expressions and gestures, maintaining the same setting and background details throughout the video.

The setting suggests a backstage or informal meeting area, with boxes and other items visible in the background, contributing to the laid-back ambiance.
